mapper.select: SELECT veh.id AS vehicleId, veh.plate_no AS plateNo, veh.default_carry_num AS defaultCarryNum, dri.real_name AS realName, dri.phone AS phone, dri.MODE AS MODE FROM d_vehicle veh left JOIN d_driver_vehicle_con con ON con.vehicle_id = veh.id left JOIN d_driver dri ON dri.id = con.driver_id left JOIN d_carrier_driver_con cdc on cdc.driver_id = dri.id left JOIN d_carrier carr ON carr.id = cdc.carrier_id WHERE carr.id = #{carrierId}

SELECT id AS id, plate_no AS plateNo, default_carry_num AS defaultCarryNum FROM d_vehicle
plate_no like concat('%',#{plateNo},'%')
and carrier_id = #{carrierId} and ownership_type = 2
and ownership_type = 1
